overview: A New York inventor, Tom Jeffers, needs cash to develop his big idea, so his adoring wife, Gerry (Geraldine), decides to raise it by divorcing him and marrying an eccentric Florida millionaire, J. D. Hackensacker III.
tagline: Love is fickle! Love is is blind! She runs 'round the country...with him behind!
cast: Claudette Colbert|Joel McCrea|Mary Astor|Rudy Vallee|Sig Arno
